verses.roman:
īśvara-sārūpya pāya pāriṣada-gaṇa
catur-bhuja, pīta-vāsa, yaiche nārāyaṇa

synonyms: īśvara-sārūpya—the same bodily features as the Lord; pāya—gets; pāriṣada-gaṇa—the associates; catur-bhuja—four hands; pīta-vāsa—yellow dress; yaiche—just as; nārāyaṇa—Lord Nārāyaṇa.
translation: His associates have the same bodily features as the Lord. They all have four arms and are dressed in yellow garments like Nārāyaṇa.
